tool.name: matchms remove spectra
tool.description: Filters spectra based on metadata presence

param.name: metadata_fields
param.label: Metadata Fields
param.help: Select metadata fields required in the spectra

param.name: spectra_removed
param.label: Output Removed Spectra
param.help: Output spectra that were removed due to missing metadata

tool.help: This tool filters input mass spectra based on the presence of specified metadata fields. Spectra missing any of the selected metadata fields are optionally logged and output separately. Valid Annotation filter removes spectra that are not fully annotated (correct and matching, smiles, inchi and inchikey)
